overview: Ah, beautiful Palm Springs, California. Truly the new Gay Mecca in the United States. Home to movie stars, sun, mountains, deserts, nudists and, of course, our own Palm Springs Sluts! A combination of locals and tourists get together in private homes and in some of our popular gay resorts to mix it up while on vacation or while the hubbies are gone on business. Cum visit us sometime, but cum prepared to play! Five scenes, nine gorgeous men and cum galore.
title: Palm Springs Sluts
